attributes.action: ban the use of police records in media publications other than to assist crime detection  - professionals who serve the state should not be allowed to profit personally from other people's grief and distress.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone who has signed any of my petitions will know of my concern over the role of the media and the emergency services. Here, the launch of a detective's paperback about the Madeleine McCann case is another example of how poor police supervision is in Britain. The petitioner is calling for the P.M. to intervene in the self interest surrounding crime - if it serious about justice. Isn't this breach of confidentiality contravening the Caldicott Principles ?
